answers.answer: You should have your dr check for causes. It may be nothing, or it may be something like preeclampsia. In my 7th month of my last pregnancy, I had only gained 12 lbs total, but in that month alone I gained 18. Turns out I had preeclampsia. But, if you have had dietary changes or decrease in exercise it could be that too. It's just always better to get checked out by your dr though :)

question: Hi,Am now 27 weeks and I gain 5 kgs in 15 days. 15 days back I was  63.3 kgs and now my weight is 68.8 kgs. Is it normal or something to be worried?? Am vegetarian and I didn't feel like eating a lot :( pls suggest me... Am tensed and do not want to over weight as am planning to go for normal delivery.... Thanks in advance..
title: Drastic changes in weight
